ygData.subject: Re: Chants vs. Melee (was Bards forgotten again.... )
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to be using songs to do damage.  that was my only point, which i regret even trying to make since it did not come across correctly, and now i am the stupid
ygData.messageBody:
> but if a bard is there to do the group buffing, you are not going
to be using songs to do damage. that was my only point, which i
regret even trying to make since it did not come across correctly,
and now i am the stupid bard who doesn't know how to play.
> Shada

With all the informative posts you have made, I'm fairly certain
nobody thought that. :) I did misunderstand your prior post
(abbreviated as it was), tho. This definitely clears it up and I
think it's obvious.

Also, I agree with the other post you made... To me, this is all a
(sometimes intelligent) discussion. :) Hopefully, "arguing" was just
a poor choice of words and nobody is truly thinking of it on that
level. If anyone is, I'm sure someone can remind all of us that EQ
is just a game. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
